column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The key here as others mentioned is arrival time; just before 8:30 it was a 10min wait
column2: by the time we left there were people waiting everywhere
column4: even with the already high rating. The homemade corned beef hash skillet was very tasty and filling. Could have went without ordering something for the kids and just splitting off of ours. Best food for the money during our trip.
